output.dependency: The value in the first column appears to identify unique products, while the value in the second column may represent an associated product identifier or SKU, possibly dependent on the product ID.

The values in the second column (product name) semantically determine the values in the third column (product type), as the product type is describing the type of beverage represented by the product name.

The size of the beverage in the fourth column may determine or imply the alcohol by volume (ABV) percentage or another descriptive format in the fifth column, as beverages often have specific volumes corresponding to certain ABV percentages.

The value in the eighth column (brewery name) semantically dictates the meaning of the values in the ninth column (location), as all entries with the same brewery should be from the same location or at least closely related.
The city in the ninth column determines the state in the tenth column, as each city in the United States is located within a single state.
